ARABIC: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That Day people will emerge segregated to see the results of their actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That day people will proceed separately to be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day people will go forth in varying states so that they be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day, people will come out of their graves in different groups to see (the results of) their own deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: On that day men will return towards their Lord, in different groups, in order to be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That Day mankind will proceed in scattered groups that they may be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: On that day men shall come forth in sundry bodies that they may be shown their works.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon that day men shall issue in scatterings to see their works,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That day mankind will issue forth in scattered groups to be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: On that Day mankind will proceed in bands, that they may be shewn their works.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: On that day, mankind will issue forth in various groups to be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: On that Day will men proceed in companies sorted out, to be shown the deeds that they (had done).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That Day mankind will proceed in scattered groups that they may be shown their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day mankind shall issue in scatterings to see their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On that Day, the people will emerge in droves, to be shown their works.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [99:6] On that day mankind shall issue forth, they will depart from the site of the Reckoning, in separate groups, divided up, so that those taking it [their book] by the right hand will go to Paradise, while those taking it by the left hand will go to the Fire, to be shown their deeds, that is, the requital for them, in [either] Paradise or the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That day) when the earth speaks (mankind will issue forth in scattered groups) a group will go to Paradise, these are the believers, and a group will go to hell, and these are the disbelievers (to be shown their deeds) what they have done of good or evil when they were in the life of the world.
